metadata.title: Ensure that /home has its own partition or logical volume
metadata.description: If user home directories will be stored locally, create a separate partition for /home. If /home will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

criterion.comment: Check in /etc/fstab for a /home mount point

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: look for /home partition or logical volume in /etc/fstab

ind:textfilecontent54_object.comment: look for the partition mount point in /etc/fstab
